live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience!
Work to restore services in the area continues.
Our technicians have been able to restore service to majority of the affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible.
Work is still being done with no ETA at this time. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technicians continue to work to restore services as soon as possible.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Further issues in the area have been found.  Teams are back on site working towards a resolution.
Power has been restored and services should be restored.  We will continue to monitor.
We continue to await restoration of power in the affected areas. Once power is restored, our services will begin to come online.
53131.summary: Some customers in Jasper are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53131.title: Sept 21 - Jasper | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
